name: Duelist Mod
description:
A Slay the Spire adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh!

SOURCE
 https://github.com/adambennett/StS-DuelistMod 

PATCH NOTES
v1.203.9
- Fixed major starting decks logic issue
- Fixed Wiretap copying itself
- Machine Factory now upgrades and exhausts properly
- Toon World is now Innate when upgraded
- Added a few new random buffs

v1.203.8
- Fixed Toon Summoned Skull bug
- Insanity, Sealed Deck, Draft, Shiny and Chimera custom run options should now function properly


Thanks for playing the Duelist! Please let me know if you have any feedback or bug reports!
